unnormalised: The gig economy presents both opportunities and challenges for HR in India. Managing compliance, especially around PF and ESIC for gig workers, requires careful consideration, as per latest Madras HC ruling on 03/10/2024. Scaling up gig work, especially in sectors like delivery (10 km radius in Bangalore) calls for robust onboarding and training at 11:00 hrs. Consider performance management metrics, perhaps OKRs aligned to organizational goals. We need clear policies by 26/01/2025, or else face labour issues. R. Sharma from IIM-A pointed this out at a HR Conclave.
